tag_list: software-and-web-development, web-application-development, recruitment-and-staffing, search-engine-optimization, e-commerce-solutions, quality-assurance
overview:
Chime Solution

Chime Solution a visionary organization, offering IT consulting services, has carried out the pioneering work, at time IT was in its nascent stage, by deploying the computer technology to hundreds of industries. Chime Solution acts as a gateway to provide a wide range of services for the human resource needs of the companies. We are a dedicated team of professional consultants offering top of the line executive search and selection over a wide geographical area that spans across Indian markets.

Chime Solution have expertise in web application development, Mobile application development, custom software development, e-commerce application development,web designing, search engine optimization and SEO services.We are now recognized throughout the world as a cutting edge software outsourcing company.

Chime Solution is one place where you go for all your visual design needs. Our designers possess many years of experience for clean, creative & organized content which gives a website intuitive navigation, and visual appeal. We look closely at how best to convey the essence of your business, the most appropriate layout of the site, ease of navigation, usage of and balance between graphics and text and even the quality and style of language and expression used.

Our Services starts with building up relationship with the client and working on focused and well-defined job profiles to get the right person.

We love to build software that works so well that it becomes automatic and instinctive to the user.

Our services are vast and range from outsourced IT to inhouse staff augmentation, consulting services to business process automation, website development to ecommerce solutions, mobile apps to the mobile web.

Software and Web Development

Web Application Development Mobile Application Development Desktop Application Development Web Designing Services Software Integration E-Commerce Solutions Application Maintenance Quality Assurance
